welcome_message_body: Welcome to Centro Habana, Cuba! Get ready to immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, rich history, and charming architecture of this bustling city. Explore the streets, indulge in the local cuisine, and soak up the unique atmosphere. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Paladar La Guarida
restaurants.description: Paladar La Guarida is a cuban restaurant located in Ciudad de La Habana.
restaurants.address: Calle Concordia, 418 (e/ Gervasio y Escobar), Ciudad de La Habana, La Habana

restaurants.name: San Cristobal Paladar
restaurants.description: San Cristobal Paladar is a cuban restaurant located in La Habana.
restaurants.address: Calle San Rafael No 469 (between Lealtad and Campanario), La Habana, La Habana

restaurants.name: el Biky
restaurants.description: el Biky is a caribbean restaurant located in La Habana.

restaurants.name: Cafe Arcangel
restaurants.description: Cafe Arcangel is a breakfast spot located in La Habana.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
